I can't even rate the food because the service was incredibly horrible to the point where regardless of the quality of the food, the service just can't be overlooked. plus the soda machine was broken. the owner should really be ashamed. that being said the wings were just decent.
I have been to this place twice and both times my order was incorrect. Nice people though, but I would like my order not to be messed up especially when I have to wait 20 minutes.

First time trying this place and it's ok.

I had a 9 piece lemon pepper. Again nothing spectacular just ok.

I did love the fact that the have a drive thru option.

The service again, just ok. No welcome, no smile, no friendly staff.

Potential is there to be a great place but for now... Just ok. No reason to really return

I was greeted immediately when I walked in the door for lunch on a Thursday afternoon. I ordered the bayou bites rolled in mango habanero (which cost me $1 extra), with honey mustard dipping sauce. The chicken was good quality white meat, with good flavors. The mango habanero really negated the need for any dipping sauce. To charge an extra buck for added flavor seems odd. The fries that came with the meal were okay, and could have been cooked a little longer.

I wouldn't argue if someone wanted to go here for lunch, but I also don't see me making any special effort to return. Personally, I prefer the much larger selection of boneless wings and sauces offered by Buffalo Wild Wings -- and I can get a beer there, which is not an option at VooDoo Wing Co.

Amazing Wings!!

I have only one complaint, and it's my issue every single time I come here, which is atleast once a week. 

The drive thru line takes ridiculously long!!!

Very affordable the sauce's are mind blowing. I recomend this place to any wing "enthusiast". Definately worth my hard earned cash! I will have to bring relatives when they come in for a visit. Make this a stop in your life and check em out!

This place is DEFINITELY my favorite wing place in town. Their hottest flavor "The Bomb" is physically painful to eat (how I like it). Their voodoo flavor is delicious and is always one of my choices. I go with boneless or traditional and every time I'm satisfied. They recently switched from generic crinkle fries to sidewinder fries, which I dip into a side of lemon pepper...it's perfect.

Rude Employees!!! No Customer Service skills, Fountain Machine was broken!!!!

Love love love the hot wings and the garlic ones are the best very good I would so recommend this place it's very clean and very good prices

I ordered the 9 piece wing meal. 9 wings, a side, and a drink costs 11 bucks and change. I tried Mango Habanero wings and they were delicious. I really enjoyed their fried pickles which came out hot and fresh covered in a crisp corn batter. Definitely worth a try if you a wing lover. Rating 4 stars because the price is a little high.
If you want the best wings in Vegas Voodoo Wing company is the place. I love all their wing flavors and the wings are always fresh. Staff is always friendly.

One of the best wings place out there , good service food came out fast not much of a wait , they giving wingstop a run for they money and it's cheaper real flavors not salty , good job I'll definitely be back

Not bad wings (not up to Hooters) at reasonable prices with lots of tasty sauces.  Convenient drive thru if you need to get back to the game.  Staff is friendly.  Nice sides.  Not a place to go if your on a diet.  The deep fry will soak your soul.  Flavor and decent chicken are the key here.

I like my wings hot and the medium and hot sauces deliver fully. The staff is so great that are very attentive, genuine, and efficient. I will be coming back soon.
Just moved to the northwest side of town and woohoo for something besides bww! Tasty wings and helpful service. The fried pickles are to DIE FOR!
Went for the first time today. Food tastes great! Never had a fried pickle until today, was impressed. May go back tomorrow to try some more flavors!

Just tried Voodoo Wing Co for the first time and it was pretty darn good. We split a 12 piece combo half lemon pepper and half Voodoo sauce. Looking forward to going back and trying out the Bomb and seeing what kind of heat it has for a sauce. See you soon!

Honestly the best wings I've had. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone that enjoys wings and wants to have a big supply at an affordable price. I picked the 9 piece and side order of fries, the wings were done perfectly and I had lemon pepper (which I say everyone should try) the mild were average but still great.

Best wings I've had in Las Vegas so far, love the fact that they have a drive thru as well. Wings are always fresh. I recommend this place to everyone who's a wing lover

I will definitely go back!!  it was worth the effort to brave the cold. Two Thumbs Up!!!!!

I'm hooked and they definitely have a loyal customer now.    The drive thru takes a few but it's worth the wait to get good wings in a drive thru.

Not my first thought for chicken wings but my boyfriends seems to really like it and it is closer than my preferred spot. They aren't bad but definitely not the best. Prices are not bad and they have your typical flavors which makes it easy to order. I like that they have a drive thru because it makes it easier to order and get home to eat.

After reading the previous reviews my expectations weren't very high.  Ordered online leaving the store across the street. When we walked in we were greeted with a very perky hello and assistance was offered. Our order wasn't ready when we walked in by it was shortly after. The one thing I would suggest is that you vent the boxes for take-out. (By that I mean poke holes in the container and that allows the wings to stay crispy).
